project_descr: The project is about to strengthen the Faculty of Law in University of The Gambia; legal education improved; Management Development Institutes better equipped; policy dialogue forum organized

outputs.output_descr: Support to the further upstream movement of UNDPs operations and delivery of policy related services at country level in the organisation’s identified focus areas (pro-poor policies, democratic governance, HIV/AIDS, sustainable energy and environment, crisis prevention and recovery and ICT for development). Provide strategic policy analysis support to the programme section, analysis of development opportunities in the focus areas of UNDP, develop, deliver and mainstream specific policy related instruments, services and advocacy tools into national development initiatives.

project_title: strategic support to university the gambia
